Assign hierarchy purpose can occur after allocating the organisations. The last two aren't exactly sequential steps. You can add organisations to a hierarchy without selecting a purpose. You can change, add remove purposes when organisations are already added. Even Microsoft's document says that hierarchies can be re-used for multiple purposes therefore consider pre-existing hierarchies when planning.
Answer is correct.
